title: laggy connection to servers since patch...
body:
Literally everything from the moment of logging in today has been nothing but delay and "unknown errors".

 Have restarted the client several times already just to go test a custom game...

 When I finally get out of these games I am finding blacked out clients with 0 buttons visible. WTF is going on?

 Am repairing installation to see if this fixes whatever this is -_-

**UPDATE: after a repair the same shit is happening. No other problems with my net so this has got to be server side. Unknown error even from just logging in**

replies.body:
Hi folks

Thanks for the reports - we're taking a look now.

Can you reply here and let us know what is your ISP, and where are you located?

Can you also paste the results of a traceroute to 192.64.169.20?

Cheers
Mindstar

Hi, 

We're going to consolidate all discussion on this into [this thread](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/TARTxsI1-connection-stability-issues-10092015).

Cheers
Mindstar

I just repaired...

 Delayed login...

 Not even sure if I am going to complete to login... This is definitely server side.
yeah me and my friends just got out of a game and had to try relogging in but still waitting :P

lets just all go play dota and give riot the arse

you know wot m8. im convinced, imma install dota right the fuck now. congrats on the post, give yourself a pat on the back, go have a pizza or nandos or whatever, you've made a change on le internet.

also everyone whos having problems is with iinet blame them moreso over riot, or both equally
if we all boycotted league with likes on a facebook page we could get anything done that we wanted to in-game we are the power they are nothing without us
